name: The Dave
description:
Not overloaded with unnecessary fields, The Dave is the simplest of our résumés. It's clean and to the point. This résumé should draw the attention of any perspective employer and win you the interview that you want.
The Dave alone: $10.00 with two rewrites. The Dave with a cover Letter: $15.00 with four rewrites. The Dave with a cover letter and a reference page: $25.00 and six rewrites.
This document will be sent to your email within four days of your order, but please allow for extra time if you use all of your rewrites.
